name: Milk Maid Meadows - (DEMO)
description:
Milk Maid Meadows is a adventure game where you satisfy the needs of your herd in order to collect enough milk to meet your the demands of your customers.

I actually started working on this for #WinterN64SpaceJam but due to a system crash and internet failure I was unable to finish on time.

Features

  • N64 graphics
  • Classic 3D platformer controls (Not Implemented)
  • Puzzles (Not Implemented)
